body_html: @facaiy sorry for the delay. As previously noted, this PR makes a change in init_ops but only adds a unit test about Keras layers' add_weight. Please add a unit test for precisely testing the change you're making, not a high-level integration test.
body_text: @facaiy sorry for the delay. As previously noted, this PR makes a change in init_ops but only adds a unit test about Keras layers' add_weight. Please add a unit test for precisely testing the change you're making, not a high-level integration test.
body: @facaiy sorry for the delay. As previously noted, this PR makes a change in `init_ops` but only adds a unit test about Keras layers' `add_weight`. Please add a unit test for precisely testing the change you're making, not a high-level integration test.
